# AVMIDISysexEvent

**Class**

An object that represents a MIDI system exclusive message.

## Declaration

```swift
class AVMIDISysexEvent
```

## Overview

You can’t modify the size and contents of this event once you create it.

## Creates a System Event

- **init(data:)**: Creates a system event with the data you specify.

## Getting the Size of the Event

- **sizeInBytes**: The size of the data that this event contains.

## Handling MIDI Events

- **AVMIDINoteEvent**: An object that represents MIDI note on or off messages.
- **AVMIDIMetaEvent**: An object that represents MIDI meta event messages.

## Inherits From

- AVMusicEvent

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
